name: nimbus
description: A 3D animated fictional landing page for the Nimbus VAPOR75 keyboard, built with Three.JS and GSAP, features scroll-triggered animations and a 3D model viewer with theme switches.

name: mythology 2.0
description: A landing page for a fictional studio, created with React, TailwindCSS & GSAP. This is an updated from the original vanilla JS project.

name: slate
description: A movie discovery web app powered by TMDB api. Features movie lists and search functionality. Saves favourites in local storage for a backend-free experience. Hosted on Netlify.

name: weather
description: A simple, responsive weather dashboard built with Nuxt.js, featuring real-time weather updates, hourly temperature graph, a weekly forecast, and a dark mode toggle. Weather data fetched from OpenWeather API.

name: watchy
description: A Trello-style board for organising movies & shows. Features monthly & weekly view, data filtering & dark mode toggle. Saves data in local storage for a backend-free experience. Hosted on Netlify.

name: frontend mentor collection
description: This is a collection page showcasing my work of completing front-end coding challenges from Frontend Mentor.

name: mythology
description: Landing page for fictional motion graphics studio Mythology. Built with vanilla Javascript, GSAP and Lenis Scroll. Designed with pop-up players, parallax effect and scroll triggers.
